bibl.title: The Gospel of Peter and Early Christian Apologetics. Rewriting the Story of Jesus' Death, Burial, and Resurrection.

series.title: Wissenschaftliche Untersuchungen zum Neuen Testament. 2. Reihe.

bibl.note: Examines the apologetic and polemical characteristics of the Gospel of Peter and demonstrates that this early Christian text was composed by reworking material from the New Testament gospels. - Introduction. - 1. The History of the Gospel of Peter and Its Status As Rewritten Gospel. - 2. Rewritten Passion Narrative: GP 1:1 - 5:19. - 3. Rewritten Signs: GP 5:20 - 8:28. - 4. Rewritten Guard Story: GP 8:29 - 9:34. - 5. Rewritten Ressurection: GP 9:35 - 11:49. - 6. Rewritten Empty Tomb and Appearance Stories (GP 12:50 - 14:60). - Conclusion. Bibliography. Indexes.
